english.segment1: laying on the floor. i've been here once before. and i'm not proud of it. misery comes today. it's coming back my way. and i want it to leave me
english.segment2: doubtful you are the people. where your anger run your sleep. fate of those whos feet are slipping. or to those whos eyes. or to those whos eyes have seen
english.segment3: to him the strength belongs. the weak attempt his arms. and show me my offence. so look away from me. becuase i can hardly see. im hiding nothing
english.segment4: doubtful you are the people. where your anger run your sleep. fate of those whos feet are slipping. or to those whos eyes. or to those whos eyes have seen
